vecHighlight.strDescription: Complete 5 quests in a single co-op game with the same 3 partners

vecHighlight.strName: What if you picked the other one?
And you liked him, didn't you?
You realize it's only points, don't you?
I don't approve of mindless fun
I was waiting for you for so long
It wasn't that hard, was it?

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Add a fire elemental effect to a sword or a khopesh
Blind 25 Volatiles with flares or a flashlight
Score 10 headshots on Rais's men with a bow
Kill 100 enemies by kicking them off the rooftops/cliffs.

vecUnachieved.strName: Clavis was a key all along

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Catch 25 enemies in the Electric Fence trap
Learn how to craft Exploding Arrows
Kill an enemy with a wrench, using Vault followed by Drop Attack
Learn how to craft Electric Arrows
Blind 25 enemies in the Light Trap

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: Show the outside world that you're still alive

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/239140/extras/dl1steamdeck_616px_eng.png?t=1716215526[/img]

From the creators of hit titles Dead Island and Call of Juarez. Winner of over 50 industry awards and nominations. The game whose uncompromising approach to gameplay set new standards for first-person zombie games. Thanks to its legacy and seven-year post-launch support, today it goes down in history as one of gaming's greatest zombie titles.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/239140/extras/New_GIF_Steam_V4_ENG.gif?t=1716215526[/img]

Survive in a city beset by a zombie virus! Discover the hard choice you will have to make on your secret mission. Will loyalty to your superiors prove stronger than the will to save the survivors? The choice is yoursâ€¦

[b]VAST OPEN WORLD
[/b]
Roam the city with unprecedented freedom and bask in its unique atmosphere. Use parkour to scale every building and reach remote areas.

[b]CREATIVE COMBAT
[/b]
Engage in gory combat and discover limitless options to confront your enemies. Use the environment paired with various weapon types and abilities to gain an advantage.

[b]DAY AND NIGHT CYCLE
[/b]
Experience the dramatic shift in the world, as you change from a hunter to hunted at sundown. Face the coming threat or run away without wasting your time to look behind.

[b]4-PLAYER CO-OP
[/b]
Join forces with other players and raise your chances of survival in an exciting co-op mode. Tackle the story campaign together and see how far you'll go as a team.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/239140/extras/steam_footer_dying_light.jpg?t=1716215526[/img]
data.strSnippet: First-person action survival game set in a post-apocalyptic open world overrun by flesh-hungry zombies. Roam a city devastated by a mysterious virus epidemic. Scavenge for supplies, craft weapons, and face hordes of the infected.
